title: The Axe
summaries: The Axe is a Hardmode, post-Plantera hamaxe, a combination of a hammer and an axe. It produces an overdriven electric guitar sound when swung, which changes in tone depending on the distance from the cursor to the player. The Axe has a 2*1/50 (2%) chance of being dropped by Plantera on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, and a 0.5*1/200 (0.5%) chance on the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version.
Its best modifier is Legendary. While Light may seem to provide a better speed boost by percentages, rounding reveals that Legendary and Light mine at equal speeds for this tool.
